wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Jameson, Lord Ardwall (5 July 1845 – 21 November 1911) was a Scottish Advocate and Judge. He is the subject of a 1913 biography by John Buchan.

response: *Andrew Jameson, Lord Ardwall (1845–1911), Scottish barrister and judge
